assignments.name: valueProposition
assignments.value: We help digital marketing agencies scale their outreach and generate more qualified leads through AI-powered automation.

nodes.name: Apollo Lead Search
nodes.notes: Replace with your Apollo.io API key in credentials

nodes.name: Enrich with Clearbit
nodes.notes: Optional - remove if you don't have Clearbit

nodes.name: Save to Google Sheets
nodes.notes: Configure with your Google Sheets credentials

nodes.name: Check No Reply
nodes.notes: Only send email 2 if they haven't replied

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "fields": {
    "First Name": "{{ $json.firstName }}",
    "Last Name": "{{ $json.lastName }}",
    "Email": "{{ $json.email }}",
    "Phone": "{{ $json.phone }}",
    "Title": "{{ $json.title }}",
    "Company": "{{ $json.company }}",
    "Website": "{{ $json.companyWebsite }}",
    "LinkedIn": "{{ $json.linkedinUrl }}",
    "Location": "{{ $json.location }}",
    "Score": {{ $json.qualificationScore }},
    "Reasoning": "{{ $json.qualificationReasoning }}",
    "Key Insights": "{{ $json.keyInsights.join(', ') }}",
    "Pain Points": "{{ $json.painPoints.join(', ') }}",
    "Email 1 Subject": "{{ $json.emailSequence.email1.subject }}",
    "Email 1 Body": "{{ $json.emailSequence.email1.body }}",
    "Email 2 Subject": "{{ $json.emailSequence.email2.subject }}",
    "Email 2 Body": "{{ $json.emailSequence.email2.body }}",
    "Email 3 Subject": "{{ $json.emailSequence.email3.subject }}",
    "Email 3 Body": "{{ $json.emailSequence.email3.body }}",
    "LinkedIn Message 1": "{{ $json.linkedinSequence.message1 }}",
    "LinkedIn Message 2": "{{ $json.linkedinSequence.message2 }}",
    "LinkedIn Message 3": "{{ $json.linkedinSequence.message3 }}",
    "Status": "{{ $json.status }}",
    "Qualified At": "{{ $json.qualifiedAt }}",
    "Campaign": "AI Sales Machine - {{ new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0] }}"
  }
}

nodes.name: Save to Airtable CRM
nodes.notes: Optional - Save to Airtable as your CRM

nodes.name: Update Tracking Data
nodes.notes: Track email metrics - customize based on your needs

nodes.name: Slack Notification
nodes.notes: Optional - Send Slack notifications for high-value leads
